itch.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if part of your body or your clothes itch, you have an unpleasant feeling on your skin that makes you want to rub it with your nails
itch.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The label on this shirt itches me.
itch.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an uncomfortable feeling on your skin that makes you want to rub it with your nails
